[00:00.00]Oxygen - 王嘉尔 (Jackson Wang)

[00:31.98]Topless walking to the frontline with no ammo
[00:35.72]I know I might get shot but I still go though
[00:39.68]Go hard go hard go hard in beast mode
[00:43.49]All I wish is the clock be ticking in slow mo
[00:47.28]In a room with no exit
[00:48.49]Not expecting things to be like this
[00:51.50]Time keep passing by
[00:52.65]I'm just gonna slowly close my eyes
[00:55.41]Can't breath for now I might die
[00:57.23]Just hoping you be mine
[00:59.25]Come back to my life

[01:33.94]Dive so deep in the ocean
[01:35.91]Ain't no life-vest protection yeah
[01:37.89]100 meters down below
[01:39.76]Even if it's 100 hours long
[01:41.55]Nothing matters anymore when I went down there
[01:43.65]Staying by my side we can conquer
[01:45.61]Maybe I can be your Aquaman

[01:49.51]Riding on the road
[01:50.23]Ain't got no traffic lights
